Memoirs of Lieutenant General Ludlow. The third and last part with a collection of original papers serving to confirm and illustrate many important passages of this and the preceding volumes : to which is added, a table to the whole work. Memoirs of Edmund Ludlow, Esq. Part 3 Ludlow, Edmund, 1617?-1692.
[10], 402, [56] p.
Printed at Vevay in the Canton of Bern, [Vevey] Switzerland : 1699.
Includes index. Errata: preliminary p. [9] Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
